task.title: How to Make the Black Beans
task.shortdesc: Black beans make the texture so much better!

prereq.p:
The Things You Will Need:
Black beans (2-3 oz. per burrito)
Small pot (In the drawer under the oven)

step.cmd: Boil a surplus amount of water in the small pot.
Add the beans and cook for 20 minutes.
Remove it from heat and strain out the water.
